title: RAD ERROR FIXED FOR MAC
body:
Click the Wifi icon on the top right.
Open Network.
Go to "Advanced"
Click on "DNS"
Use the + button to add the two DNS servers.
8.8.8.8
8.8.4.4

in any order, try both if it doesnt work. im running latest version of everything and this worked for me straight away


also a big suckabutt for the people just reposting the windows method on people complaining about macs. your ignorance has upset more than just those who posted
